meanings.definition: To consume more food than someone else.
meanings.sent1: Tommy outeats his sister at dinner every night.
meanings.sent2: She always outeats her friends at the pizza party.
meanings.sent3: The little hamster outeats the big rabbit in the race for carrots.
meanings.sent4: The competitive eater outeats his opponents with ease.
meanings.sent5: The hungry bear outeats all the other animals in the forest.

meanings.sent1: The champion eater outeats all the contestants in the hot dog competition.
meanings.sent2: He outeats everyone at the barbecue with his huge appetite.
meanings.sent3: The tiny bird outeats the squirrel in the nut-eating contest.
meanings.sent4: The voracious shark outeats the other fish in the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The competitive eater outeats his own record at the eating contest.
